title: Provided that any draft list which is published and pending for the approval of GoM shall, in the interim period, be deemed to be part of the heritage list and provisions of this regulation shall be applicable to the said draft list
clause_text: Provided that any draft list which is published and pending for the approval of GoM shall, in the interim period, be deemed to be part of the heritage list and provisions of this regulation shall be applicable to the said draft list.
section: Preparation of list of Heritage Buildings and Heritage Precincts:
